name: THE FIBROID COALITION
description: Advocacy and education related to non-surgical treatment of uterine fibroids.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Education and advocacy to encourage and support medical research in the nonsurgical alternatives for treating fibroids; Support Stephanie Tubbs Jones Uterine Fibroid Research and Education Act.
